value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Here is the gateway to Vanaheimr.
It will deliver us to the realm of light,
where we may find hope yet.$k$pThis way, children of Midgard...
As a goddess of light, allow me
to be your guide here.$k$p$EFace_Blush2|...Please, forgive my mistake before.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I knew you'd be able to help
us, Seiðr!$k$pWe know you're doing your very
best for us—and that's all we can
ask for, as your friends!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE15_04,0|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Now then, children of Midgard,
onward, to the realm of light...$k$pKing Njörðr is sure to know of some
way we can stop Gullveig and save
your world.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|The realm of light...$k$pAccording to the legends of Askr,
it is the realm of the gods of light,
known as the vanir.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What's it like there? If it's made
of light, does that mean that
everything there is sparkly?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Stay focused, Princess Sharena.
Missions into unknown realms are
extremely dangerous. Be ready.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Everyone set? Let's get going!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|...Urgh! Gahhh...$k$pWhat... What are you?$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|Time is the master of all things,
and it is time that decides all of
our fates.$k$pNow is not the time for you to die.
That will come later, when the whole
of this land lies in ruin.$k$pThis is the purpose of the
Golden Seer. It is for this
reason that I exist.$k$p$Sbs150|
